North_Las_Vegas.The Boulevard Mall: The Boulevard Mall is located at 3528 S. Maryland Pkwy in Paradise, Nevada, United States (an unincorporated town in the Las Vegas Valley). The mall, located on 75 acres (30 ha), is a single-story super-regional mall with 1,180,000 sq ft (110,000 m2) of lease-able retail space. The mall has 140 stores, of which there are three anchor stores (Goodwill, Marshalls, and Sears).
